pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prediction Intervals for Random-Effects Meta-Analysis // An implementation of prediction intervals for random-effects meta- analysis: Higgins et al. (2009) doi:10.1111/j.1467-985X.2008.00552.x, Partlett and Riley (2017) doi:10.1002/sim.7140, and Nagashima et al. (2018) doi:10.1177/0962280218773520, arXiv:1804.01054.
